rows.label: qst702204_msg0001
rows.name: Oh! It's the key! No mistaking it!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0002
rows.name:
Try not to drop it in any more
deadly dangerous places, OK?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0003
rows.name: Yes, Ma'am! Thank you, Ma'am!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0004
rows.name: Ah, about that, Veritas...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0005
rows.name:
I've been thinking it's high
time you took some time off.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0006
rows.name: You don't have to take it that far...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0007
rows.name: No, I think it's important, actually.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0008
rows.name:
I know that herb you've been picking.
Clearbright Cress, no? It's a remedy
for diseases of the blood.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0009
rows.name: Agh! Th-that's...!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0010
rows.name:
Ah! You did say you were picking
the herbs for your grandmother...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0011
rows.name:
Clearbright Cress is quite rare...
I hear that it's used only to treat
the gravest of afflictions.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0012
rows.name: Is that why you went to those lengths?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0013
rows.name:
You needn't worry about your
duties. Just hurry home and
tend to your grandmother.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0014
rows.name:
After all, nothing is as valuable
as good health and family.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0015
rows.name: Adel-sama...you're too kind...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0016
rows.name:
So that's the most valuable thing
that's not found in vaults, eh?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0017
rows.name:
As long as you're alive, there
is hope, in all things. What could
be more precious than that?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0018
rows.name:
As you say, Lord... Then
I accept your punishment,
and thank you for it.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0019
rows.name:
Right, so... If you need
anything, I can just grab
it from the vault! Sir!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0020
rows.name: Ah, indeed...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0021
rows.name: Laura is there anything you need?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0022
rows.name: Whuh?!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0023
rows.name:
We've only come this far
thanks to you. Speak, and
your wish will be granted.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0024
rows.name:
You're kinda putting me
on the spot here...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0025
rows.name:
...How about a recipe for some
royally delicious meal that's
been handed down in your family?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0026
rows.name:
Laura, is that the
best use of a wish..?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0027
rows.name: N-no, but I mean... I'm curious, OK?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0028
rows.name:
Teehee... Hunger will get
the better of anyone.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0029
rows.name:
Well, you heard the lady,
Veritas. Fetch us a recipe.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0030
rows.name:
And whatever else you think
we might find useful on our
journey, I suppose.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0031
rows.name: Yes, Lord! Straight away, Lord!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0032
rows.name:
Here you are, Lord! I picked
things out as best I could, Lord!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0033
rows.name:
And, uh, your kindness earlier...
I'll never forget it, Lord! I'll
teach my kids to honor it too, Lord!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0034
rows.name:
None in my lineage will ever forget
the good turn you did us, Prince
Adel, Sir! Laura-sama, Ma'am!
